3) FOR GMAT


• Beat the GMAT.com

 • For the real test feel! - At MBA.com

 • For Practice- Veritas Prep GMAT Simulator

 • Take an online Course - The Free GMAT Math Course offered by About.com

 • Need Coaching? - AspirantHunt.com

 • How to Score Well – Eduers.com

 • All in one site- Knewton.com

 • Put Yourself To The Test- 4tests.com

 • 800Score- You can download free GMAT tests for your use, completely free of charge.

 • QS LEAP: http://www.qsleap.com/

 • Veritas Prep: http://www.veritasprep.com/blog/category/gmat/

 • GMAT Tutor Blog: https://gmat.economist.com/blog

 • GMAT Club: http://gmatclub.com/

 • TopMBA.com: http://www.topmba.com/admissions/gmatgre

 • Beat the GMAT: http://www.beatthegmat.com/mba/how-to-get-a-700-on-the-gmat

 • KAPLAN Test Plan: http://www.kaptest.com/gmat

 • Empower GMAT: http://www.empowergmat.com/

 • Magoosh: https://gmat.magoosh.com/

 • Manhattan Review online GMAT course: http://www.manhattanreview.com/gmat-online-prep-courses/

4) Quantitative Aptitude Recommended books for CAT/XAT/MBA Exams


•While preparing for Quantitative Aptitude for CAT/XAT/MBA one can refer following books:


1. Book Name:How to Prepare for Quantitative Aptitude for the CAT Common Admission Test, Author:Arun

 2.Quantitative Aptitude For Competitive Examinations by Guha Abhijit

 3.The Pearson Guide to Quantitative Aptitude for CAT by Nishit Sinha


• Data Interpretation Logical Reasoning Recommended books for CAT/MBA

 For Data Interpretation any of the following books can be followed:


1.TMH's How To Prepare For The Data Interpretation And Logical Reasoning For The CAT 3rd Edition by Arun

 2.The Pearson Guide to Data Interpretation and Logical Reasoning for the CAT (With CD) by Nishit K. Sinha

 3.How to Prepare for Logical Reasoning for the CAT Common Admission Test 1st Edition by Arun Sharma

 4. How to Prepare for Data Interpretation for the CAT Common Admission Test 1st Edition by Arun Sharma


•Verbal Ability and Logical Reasoning Recommended books for CAT/MBA Entrance


1. How to Prepare for Verbal Ability and Reading Comprehension for the CAT Common Admission by Arun Sharma

 2. The Pearson Guide To Verbal Ability And Logical Reasoning For The CAT by Nishit K. Sinha

 3. A Modern Approach To Verbal and Non-Verbal Reasoning Revised Edition by R. S. Aggarwal

 4. Trishna's Verbal Ability And Logical Reasoning For The CAT And Other MBA Examinations by TIME


You can also refer Byju's CAT material for all sections .

7) Useful Government Websites For Civil Service Preparation


1. ncert.nic.in – Download NCERT Texts as PDF.

 2. nios.ac.in – Download NIOS Online Materials.

 3. egyankosh.ac.in – Download IGNOU Books.

 4. yojana.gov.in – Download Yojana and Kurukshetra Magazines.

 5. upsc.gov.in – Official Website of UPSC.

 6. pib.nic.in – Press Information Bureau Website, for government updates.

 7. prsindia.org – PRS Website for tracking bills in Parliament.

 8. idsa.in – IDSA website for Defense and Foreign relations.

 9. gatewayhouse.in – Indian Council for Global relations.

 10. envfor.nic.in – Ministry of Environment and Forests.

 11. mea.gov.in – Ministry of External Affairs.

 12. indiabudget.nic.in – Download Budget and Economic Survey.

 13. ptinews.com – Press Trust of India.

 14. pdgroup.upkar.in – Pratiyogita Darpan Magazine.

 15. ibef.org – India Brand Equity Foundation for economy and business.

 16. vikaspedia.in – Knowledge initiative by InDG.

 17. makeinindia.com – Make in India initiative for manufacturing related info.
